name: chatkit-mercedes-benz-automobile
description: Mercedes-Benz Automobile Voice Assistant - ChatKit Example

scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.frontend: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend run dev
scripts.backend: uv sync --directory backend && uv run --directory backend uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8004 --reload
